name: Air Fight (plazmaero)
description: Air Fight, while on a platform, you need to avoid and fire the incoming cannons. Try to hit a 2 birds one stone at the time as well to gain more life points. Your bird Budger also regularly comes in to serve you a balloon so you can jump higher every minute. The other file main.py is the source code. Yes, all of the game logic in one .py file.
